title: PyOhio 2011: Using Fabric - from a sysadmin's perspective
description:
Using Fabric -- from a sysadmin's perspective

Presented by Morgan Goose

Fabric is a great tool written in python for python devs. It allows you
to script remote interactions on a remote server and only requires ssh
and a shell on the remote host. It's commonly pigeonholed into a
deployment tool, but it can but used for more than just websites.
